description.@en: You steal the essence of fallen foes by eating from their remains.

criticalFailure.@en: Your essence is immediately drained away! You immediately suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] mental Peril and are left Defenseless for the spellâ€™s Duration.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and you are immune to physical Peril inflicted by foes (such as from Chokehold).

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, add 3 to your Peril Threshold and you cannot become Incapacitated!, instead remaining at Ignore 3 Skill Ranks. At the end of the Duration, you suffer 3 Corruption.

reagents.@en: A roasted marrow bone made from your own Ancestry, sucked on (expended)
